question: Which companies have reported a shift in their technology stacks that correlates with leadership changes in the last six months?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have reported shifts in their technology stacks. [CompanyTechStack]
Identify leadership changes that have occurred in the last six months. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
